entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 02:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or a few flurries changing to periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
